items.title: Gennova, CEPI ink pact to develop AI-enhanced Nipah vaccine with $13.4 million funding
items.description: At present, there is no approved vaccine or specific treatment exist for the virus, which has a mortality rate of 75 percent.

items.title: Emcure derma subsidiary in pact Italian skin company to distribute latter's product
items.description: The strategic partnership grants Emcutix the rights to import, promote, distribute and sell WiQo's ground- breaking product PRX-PLUS in India.

items.title: Karnataka Governor sends mining tax bill to President for assent
items.description: The Governor observed that the proposed The Mineral Rights and Mineral Bearing Land) Tax Bill would 'transgress' constitutional limitations and provisions, and 'adversely affect' legitimate interest of other state or its people.

items.title: Ice cream maker Vadilal's shares surge 5% as promoter family settles tussle, recasts board to separate ownership
items.description: The fourth generation of the promoters of Vadilal, the Gandhi family, have 'harboured diverse interests' and different ambitions, the company had said in a statement, implying varying perception of the 'strategic direction' of the group.

items.title: V2 Retail: Will this fashion retailer deliver value to investors?
items.description: The company is positioning itself as a key player in India’s value retail sector.

items.title: Will the steady rise in demand for domestic natural gas propel this stock?
items.description: GAIL looks to have financial headroom to execute energy infrastructure projects

items.title: Indian companies gear up for nuclear expansion amid policy shift: Report
items.description: The Centre is developing a Nuclear Energy Mission framework and considering amendments to the Atomic Energy Act and the Civil Liability for Nuclear Damage Act, to encourage private sector participation.
